original_text: Their children went in and took possession of the land. You subdued before them the Canaanites, who lived in the land; you gave the Canaanites into their hands, along with their kings and the peoples of the land, to deal with them as they pleased.
korean_text: 그 자손이 들어가서 땅을 차지하되 주께서 그 땅 가나안 주민들이 그들 앞에 복종하게 하실 때에 가나안 사람들과 그들의 왕들과 본토 여러 족속들을 그들의 손에 넘겨 임의로 행하게 하시매

sentences.original_text: and took possession of the land
you gave the Canaanites into their hands
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 가나안 사람들을 그들의 손에 넘겨주었습니다

sentences.original_text: and the peoples of the land
to deal with them as they pleased
sentences.korean_translation: 자기들이 원하는 대로 그들을 다루게 하시려고
